name: Boom! VR
description:
In Boom!, you take upon the roles of a boom mic operator in a stylized world. Make sure you put the microphones in the correct positions, or the director's going to be angry! 

Witness first hand B+ movies in the making all the while running around frantically trying to avoid the cameras.

Good luck!

This is the full game. It was submitted to the 2020 VR Jam but couldn't be uploaded in time due to technical issues. The whole game was made in under 7 days by CoconutDawg, nstol, Rollerstar and somepoint_sound_derm.
